title: living between two planes: fran silvestre’s minimalist house seems to float in andalusia
description: sandwiched between two planes, the 'house in sotogrande' features a cantilevered roof that extends beyond the glass structure. The post living between two planes: fran silvestre’s minimalist house seems to float in andalusia appeared first on designboom | architecture & design magazine.
author: kat barandy I designboom
excerpt: sandwiched between two planes, fran silvestre's 'house in sotogrande' features a cantilevered roof that extends beyond the glass structure.

project info:

name: House in Sotogrande

area: 802 square meters
